physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ms. A appeared dysphoric, was tearful, and exhibited a decreased appetite with a reported 10 lb weight loss over the past 2 months. No clinically significant changes in blood pressure were reported.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Ms. A's mood and activity level dramatically improved after starting tranylcypromine, with subsequent reporting of slight depression two weeks later necessitating an increase in dosage.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mr. B reported feelings of hopelessness and appeared withdrawn. No clinically significant changes in blood pressure were noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After starting treatment with tranylcypromine, Mr. B experienced significant improvement within 2 weeks and described himself as being 'back to my former self' within 6 weeks despite persistent cognitive decline.
